name: Ocean Fixer
description: It is all obvious that the ocean is full of trash so that is why you came along to fix it. Now this is a daunting task as there are 17.6 billion pounds of trash but you know you have to start somewhere. Just buy some people to sell your trash and some to pick it up and bam! you already have your company started. Now I'll leave you to it as the ocean is very big and has lots of trash.
